      • getPluginLogger

        PluginLogger getPluginLogger()
        Gets the plugin logger
        返回:
        the logger

      • getScheduler

        SchedulerAdapter getScheduler()
        Gets an adapter for the platforms scheduler
        返回:
        the scheduler

      • getClassPathAppender

        ClassPathAppender getClassPathAppender()
        Gets a ClassPathAppender for this bootstrap plugin
        返回:
        a class path appender

      • getLoadLatch

        java.util.concurrent.CountDownLatch getLoadLatch()
        Returns a countdown latch which counts down after the plugin has loaded.
        返回:
        a loading latch

      • getEnableLatch

        java.util.concurrent.CountDownLatch getEnableLatch()
        Returns a countdown latch which counts down after the plugin has enabled.
        返回:
        an enable latch

      • getVersion

        java.lang.String getVersion()
        Gets a string of the plugin's version
        返回:
        the version of the plugin

      • getStartupTime

        java.time.Instant getStartupTime()
        Gets the time when the plugin first started in millis.
        返回:
        the enable time

      • getDataDirectory

        java.nio.file.Path getDataDirectory()
        Gets the plugins main data storage directory

        Bukkit: ./plugins/FloraCore

        返回:
        the platforms data folder

      • getConfigDirectory

        default java.nio.file.Path getConfigDirectory()
        Gets the plugins configuration directory
        返回:
        the config directory

      • isPlayerOnline

        boolean isPlayerOnline(java.util.UUID uniqueId)
        Checks if a user is online
        参数:
        uniqueId - the users external uuid
        返回:
        true if the user is online

      • identifyClassLoader

        default @Nullable java.lang.String identifyClassLoader(java.lang.ClassLoader classLoader)
                                                throws java.lang.Exception
        Attempts to identify the plugin behind the given classloader.

        Used for giving more helpful log messages when things break.

        参数:
        classLoader - the classloader to identify
        返回:
        the name of the classloader source
        抛出:
        java.lang.Exception - anything
